Name: Midnight Driver
About the game: Dive into the golden era of Japanese street racing. Choose from a list of iconic cars and perfect your driving skills in beautiful mountain roads. Challenge your friends and rivals in downhill or uphill battles. At night, the streets are yours. Iconic cars In this arcade racing game choose from 14 iconic cars representing the spirit of golden era of street racing in mountain passes. Beautiful locations 4 Beautiful locations with lots of layout options. Downhill or uphill, ring or open. Drive on twisting roads to perfect your skills and challenge your friends in multiplayer races. Challenge your friends and rivals Up to 4 player multiplayer to race or drive around gorgeous mountain passes
